H0.text: where did the iroquois indians come from. New York

H2.text: where did the iroquois indians come from. Pennsylvania

H3.text: where did the iroquois indians come from. Qu√©bec

A4.text: When Europeans first arrived in North America, the Haudenosaunee were based in what is now central and west New York State including the Finger Lakes region.

A5.text: They occupied large areas north to the St. Lawrence River, east to Montreal and the Hudson River, and south into what is today northwestern Pennsylvania.

A6.text: Fort Stanwix National Monument (U.S. National Park Service)
